amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the requirements in the Davis-Bacon Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 235 (Roll no. 338).
